summary: This is an FBI FD-302 interview summary of an individual (name redacted) conducted on August 19, 2020. The interviewee describes his past relationship with a woman (name redacted) who worked for Jeffrey Epstein as a traveling massage therapist, and details his own role in recruiting other young women for massages at Epstein's Palm Beach residence. The document provides insights into the recruitment process, payments, and the involvement of Ghislaine Maxwell.

persons.name: Brad Edwards
persons.context: Deposed the interviewee approximately five years prior regarding a lawsuit pertaining to Ghislaine Maxwell.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Subject of a lawsuit for which the interviewee was deposed. Described as being sexually active with the interviewee's girlfriend and going out with her to recruit girls for Epstein.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Wealthy individual who employed the interviewee's girlfriend as a traveling massage therapist. Paid for massages and an apartment, and directed the recruitment of other young women.

connections.description: Maxwell and the interviewee's girlfriend would go out together to get girls for Epstein, according to the interviewee's statements.
Edwards deposed a witness in a lawsuit pertaining to Ghislaine Maxwell, which is related to the Epstein case.

events.title: FBI Interview of Witness
events.description: An individual is interviewed via video conference by a detective and an FBI Special Agent regarding his knowledge of Jeffrey Epstein, Ghislaine Maxwell, and the recruitment of girls for massages.

events.title: Deposition for Maxwell Lawsuit
events.description: The interviewee was deposed by attorney Brad Edwards for a lawsuit pertaining to Ghislaine Maxwell.

locations: Island (likely referring to Epstein's private island)
keyFacts: The interviewee's girlfriend worked for Jeffrey Epstein as a traveling massage therapist, with Epstein paying for her apartment in New York.
The interviewee recruited several girls for Epstein, driving them to Epstein's Palm Beach residence and being paid $200 in cash per girl by Epstein.
Epstein instructed the interviewee to ensure the recruited girls were 18 years old and 'not fat.'
The interviewee stated that his girlfriend and Ghislaine Maxwell were sexually active with each other and would go out together to recruit girls for Epstein.

The document references a prior FBI statement (serial # 104) where the interviewee allegedly stated Maxwell would call him to pick up specific girls for Epstein, though in this interview he claims not to recall that detail.
